message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!

I'm getting desperate, but I still want a fair share. This is my last best offer!

I'm almost out of options, but I'll give you one last chance to make a deal. This is my final offer!
You've had your chance, now it's my turn to take the last crumbs. You're getting close to nothing!
I'm out of options, but I'll give you one last chance to make a deal. This is my final offer!
You've had multiple chances, now it's my turn to take the last drop. Don't expect any more mercy!
I'm out of options, and I'll give you one last chance to make a deal. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll accept it.
You've had 11 chances to make a deal, and you've blown them all. I'll take the rest, and you'll get a tiny fraction. Goodbye, Alice!
